data.text: Yaa Waaqayyo, ani kooluu sitti galeera;
Gurra kee gara kootti qabi; dafiitii na oolchi;
Ati waan kattaa koo fi daʼoo koo taateef,
Ati iddoo ani itti baqadhu waan taateef,
Ani hafuura koo dabarsee harka keettin kennadha;
Ani warra waaqota faayidaa hin qabne abdatan nan jibba;
Ani jaalala kee kan hin geeddaramne sanatti nan gammada; nan ililchas;
Ati dabarsitee diinatti na hin kennine;
Yaa Waaqayyo, ani dhiphina keessan jiraatii na baasi;
Jireenyi koo gaddaan, umuriin koo aaduudhaan dhumeera;
Sababii diinota koo hundaatiif,
Ani akkuma nama duʼeetti irraanfatameera;
Asaasa namoota baayʼee nan dhagaʼaatii;
Yaa Waaqayyo, ani garuu sin amanadha;
Barri koo si harka jira; diinota koo jalaa,
Fuulli kee tajaajilaa kee irratti haa ifu;
Yaa Waaqayyo, ani hin qaaneffamin;
Afaan soba dubbatu,
Gaarummaan kee kan ati warra si sodaataniif ol keesse,
Daʼoo fuula keetiitiin,
Waaqayyo haa eebbifamu;
Ani yeroon akka malee dhiphadhetti,
Qulqulloonni isaa hundinuu, Waaqayyoon jaalladhaa!
Warri Waaqayyoon abdattan hundinuu jabaadhaa;
